metadata.title: CVE-2024-26662 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix 'panel_cntl' could be null in'dcn21_set_backlight_level()' 'panel_cntl' structure used to control thedisplay panel could be null, dereferencing it could lead to a null pointeraccess. Fixes the below:drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../display/dc/hwss/dcn21/dcn21_hwseq.c:269dcn21_set_backlight_level() error: we previously assumed 'panel_cntl' couldbe null (see line 250)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26662` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-1027-fips - 4.15.0-1027.32
linux-image-hmac-4.15.0-1027-fips - 4.15.0-1027.32
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1027-fips - 4.15.0-1027.32
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-1027-fips - 4.15.0-1027.32
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2000-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2000.4
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2000-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2000.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1002-azure-fips - 4.15.0-1002.2
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-1002-azure-fips - 4.15.0-1002.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2013-gcp-fips - 4.15.0-2013.14
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2013-gcp-fips - 4.15.0-2013.14
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
